title: 820-3115-B shows 100% all the time
message: Are all details about the battery displayed? Cycle count, full charge capacity, etc?

title: 820-3115-B shows 100% all the time
message: ok on external system it shows actual precent and displays all details though charging NO and no orange led.

title: 820-3115-B shows 100% all the time
message: Sense resistors or traces R7021/22/51/52, the usual. Check that PPBUS is 12.56V and not 12.23V too without battery connected.
